General.Name: VivoPower International PLC
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: VivoPower International PLC, together with its subsidiaries, provides energy solutions for customized and ruggedized fleet applications, battery and microgrids, and solar and critical power technology and services. It operates through Electric Vehicles, Sustainable Energy Solutions, and Solar Development segments. The Electric Vehicles segment designs and develops electric battery conversion kits to replace internal combustion engines for light utility vehicle fleets and mining sector. It also provides electric utility vehicles for mining and other off-road, and ruggedized or customized on-road applications; public utility vehicle electric powertrain conversion kits for the jeepneys; and OEM light utility pick up trucks under the Tembo Tuskers brand name. The Sustainable Energy Solutions segment engages in the design, evaluation, sale, and implementation of renewable energy infrastructure. The Solar Development segment develops solar projects. It operates in Australia, Canada, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, the United States, and the Philippines. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: The Scalpel, London, United Kingdom, EC3M 7AF
